name: ChooseAMovie
0:
”Alexa, open Choose A Movie”
”Alexa, start Choose A Movie”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: choose a movie
des:
We’ve all been there. You want to watch a movie but you’re just not sure what to throw on. So you spend 45 minutes digging through Netflix, HBO, Hulu, and iTunes just to find something that might be good. By that time, you’ve either given up and reverted back to The Office for the millionth time or you found something that’s complete garbage.

That’s where the Choose A Movie skill comes into help. Ask Alexa to suggest a film from a few different categories and she’ll give you a random suggestion of a list containing over 100 different movies. All of these films either have high praises from critics, audiences or are films we personally recommend and enjoy.

This list is updated every month with new movies, and releases. Interested in listening to a podcast about movies that just hit theaters? Join the conversation at www.rackingfocuspodcast.com
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
